info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 02 at 7:02PM MDT until August 02 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR DAVISON...SOUTH CENTRAL SANBORN...SOUTHERN AURORA...NORTH CENTRAL CHARLES MIX...DOUGLAS AND NORTHWESTERN HUTCHINSON COUNTIES... At 802 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Aurora Center to near New Holland to 7 miles northeast of Geddes, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Harrison and Aurora Center around 805 PM CDT. Plankinton and Stickney around 815 PM CDT. Armour and Corsica around 820 PM CDT. Mount Vernon around 830 PM CDT. Mitchell, Parkston, Ethan, Dimock and Loomis around 845 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
